title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: No one can cancel your fun unless you allow it. Someone may try to dump their negativity at your doorstep on what otherwise feels like a pleasurable day. However, you might waste irreplaceable time and resources now by feeding into that persons bad vibes. It's possible to return to your previous agenda if you gently but firmly block off their energy and attend to your own happiness. Sometimes, the best way to minimize anyones encroaching pessimism is to broaden and lengthen your own enthusiasm. Attitude is everything. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
